Three different karts are availabe for racing: Adult Karts - offer integrated weight boxes allowing for the addition of 60lbs of weight to the kart so you can test your skill against your friends or co-workers and take the weight bias out of the equation. Junior Karts - powered by 5.5hp Honda motors, and Super Karts - featuring 70cc Honda power plants.
Address: 4245 Carolina Avenue, Bldg B Richmond, VA 23222

Name: Appleland Raceway Park
Description: Outdoor go kart track, fun for the whole family!

Name: American Indoor Karting Go Kart Track
Description: Indoor go kart race track located in Virginia Beach Virginia. American Indoor Karting features three levels of race karts: Adult Karts - European racing karts with 6.5hp Honda motors, internal wet clutches, upholstered Tillet seats, Caliba steering wheels, hydraulic disc brakes, seat belts and roll bar protection. Junior Karts - Powered with 5.5hp Honda motors, internal wet clutches, hydraulic disk brakes, adjustable gas and brake pedals, adjustable seats and steering columns. Super Karts - feature 9hp Honda power and upgraded Tillet seats, and huge disc brakes. Junior Karts, approximately 25mph; Adult Karts, approximately 35-40 mph; Super Karts outperform the adult karts in every way!
Address: 2736 North Mall Drive Virginia Beach, VA 23452

Name: Eastside Speedway Go Kart Track
Description: Outdoor go kart race track featuring Outlaw Karting.

Name: Sunset Speedway Go Kart Track
Description: Sunset Speedway is a 1/5th mile clay oval go kart race track. Sunset Speedway is located just west of Spokane in Airway Heights in the Spokane Motorsports ORV complex.
Address: 20 S Russell St Airway Heights, WA 99001

Name: Jackson Prairie Speedway Go Kart Track
Description: Jackson Prairie Speedway consists of two go kart tracks: a 1/8th mile, lighted, banked clay oval and a 1/6th mile banked clay oval currently under construction.

Name: PGP Motorsports Park Go Kart Track
Description: PGP Motorsports Park is a state of the art multi-configuration paved motorsports track located in Kent, Washington. This unique facility can support Karting, Supermoto, Car Lapping, Scooter Racing, AutoCross and much, much more. With a layout that is able to support 12 different track configurations, running both clockwise (CW) and counter clockwise (CCW) PGP Motorsports Park is always thrilling and fresh. Rental karts are available. PGP Motorsports Park utilizes the Birel N35 as its rental kart of choice. The N35 is Italian-built, draws upon a World Championship heritage and is the premier corporate entertainment kart on the market today and features a Honda 9hp 4-stroke engine with gearing to run 45mph.

Name: Grand Prix Raceway Indoor Go Kart Track
Description: Grand Prix Raceway Indoor Go Kart Track features a wide racing surface means adequate room for passing and race maneuvers, and a couple of long straights result in high speeds and fast lap times! The track also features a barrier system, computerized timing/scoring using a state-of-the-art AMB scoring system to keep accurate scores and results. Facility also includes a climate controlled viewing lounge with video display.

Name: K1 Speed Seatle
Description: Track features a concrete racing surface instead of an asphalt racing surface. This surface allows for great "drifting" opportunities! Karts at K1 are electric powered with a 20hp DC electric motor that produces far more torque than other kart engines, the electric karts have superb acceleration out of tight corners; while a gas engine can get bogged down, electric motors are capable of delivering maximum torque instantaneously. And unlike a gas-powered kart, an electric go kart can be programmed to a variety of pre-set speeds to accommodate guests of varying skill levels, including beginner, intermediate and advanced. The electric karts are also programmed for automatic speed reduction while in the pits and can be turned off remotely in the event of an emergency.

Name: Tri-City Kart Club
Description: Outdoor road course go kart track. Track provides racing and practice dates. See website for details and schedules.

Name: Puget Sound Go Kart Association
Description: The historic Mountain Highway Raceway is a tight, challenging sprint layout with significant elevation changes. The last decade has seen the complete resurfacing of the track (1991) and the repaving and reshaping in concrete of the turns (1996), as well as pit area and parking expansion. (2004) the track was lengthened to 1972 ft and the straightaway was straightened out and is now 552ft in length. Additional improvements are continually being made by a dedicated group of volunteers and the PSGKA is well-established as one of the finest and most active karting clubs in the nation, providing quality family recreation and competition.

Name: Fast Kart Indoor Speedway Go Kart Racing
Description: Race Indoor Go Karts with up to 8 karts at a time in wheel-to-wheel competition. Corporate events for Team Building & employee incentive programs. 40, 60 and 100 lap indoor go kart races available.

Name: Skykart Indoor Racing Center Go Kart Track
Description: Sykart Indoor Racing Center is an indoor go-kart racing facility providing the very best in walk-in racing, corporate team building events, birthday parties and much more. Skykart uses european karts by SodiKart. World renowned for both their durable indoor rental karts as well as their outdoor karts, they've been a staple of the NW Indoor Karting scene for 7-8 years. Skykart uses the 6.5HP GT2 Proline and the 9HP GT4. Both karts are capable of speeds in excess of 40mph on an indoor track.

Name: Apex Karting Indoor Go Kart Track
Description: Indoor road course go kart race track. Apex Karting’s fleet of Stratos Karts feature clean burning 9HP Honda engines, real racing slicks, Wilwood Disk Brakes and Tillet racing seats, these “Made in America” racing karts are capable of reaching speeds that feel faster than 40MPH. The karts have both adjustable seats and adjustable throttle and brake pedals and will accommodate racers from 4’10” to 6’8”.

Name: Summit Point Motorsports Park
Address: 201 Motorsports Park Cir, Summit Point, WV 25446

Name: Sugar River Raceway Go Kart Track
Description: Sugar River Raceway is a 1/2 mile paved asphalt road course designed and built specially for go kart racing. The track has been in continuous operation since 1959, and is owned and operated by the Fairman family. Weekly race programs are run April through October. The track is open during the week for both private and open practice sessions. A complete kart shop is located on site that offers retail and mail order sales of go karts and go kart parts. Private dates are also available for outings in which our facilities, karts, and safety gear are made available to corporations, clubs, or organizations.
Address: N2236 Mt Hope Rd Brodhead, WI 53520

Name: Hi-Go Raceway Go Kart Track
Description: Hi-Go Raceway is an 1/8th mile clay track located 1/4 mile north of Cecil, Wisconsin on Highway 22. Track is a clay base and is a "true" 1/8 mile in length measured on the inside of the track. It measures 325' x 150'. The straights are 25 feet wide and the corners are 30+ feet wide. Electrical hookups and water are available to the karters at the track.

Name: GSR Kartway Go Kart Track
Description: Dirt Kart Racing on a 1/8 Mile Clay Oval, 30 foot Wide Straights - Semi-Banked Turns. Track also features: Elevated Spectator Area and Bleachers, Play Area for the Children, Concession Stand, Free Parking with View (can even watch the races from the comfort of your own vehicle) or bring your own lawn chairs and Relax on the hillside. Racing Wednesday Evenings throughout the Season. See track website for race schedule.

Name: Badger Kart Club
Description: Badger Raceway is a 6/10 mile paved road course operated by Badger Kart Club. Spectators are always welcome and admission is Free for spectators to the Raceway grounds.
Address: W377 S1851 Gramling Ln. Dousman, WI 53118

Name: Road America Karting Club
Description: Road America Karting Club races at the Briggs & Stratton Motorplex within the Road America Race Track. The go kart track is a 8/10 mile kart track that is located inside the 4 mile track between turns 6 and 11. Track is a FIK/CIK approved track with over 50 feet of elevation change - a technically challenging track with some of the best corners in go karting!

Name: Kastle Park
Description: The paved 1/4 mile go kart track at Kastle Park features 30 banked curves providing driving fun for all ages. In addition to the go karts the family fun park offers Mega Mini Golf, Bumper Boats, Batting Cages, Paintball Target Range, and Arcade. A concession stand / snack bar sells a variety of refreshments.
Address: 2301 N Irwin Ave Green Bay, WI 54302

Name: Thunder Hill Speedway
Description: Thunder Hill Speedway is a family-owned 1/8 mile, clay oval track located in Menomonie, Wisconsin only one hour east of Minneapolis/St.Paul, MN. Thunder Hill Speedway races Flat track karts, Winged outlaw karts and ATV's on the 1/8 mile, clay, oval. Full concession stand and a beautiful hillside with grandstand seating for spectators. Racing every Saturday Night May-September.

Name: Ringle Speedway Go Kart Track
Description: Ringle Speedway Go Kart Track is a 1/5 mile dirt surface tri-oval with wide banked corners, long straights and a tight hairpin.

Name: US Air Motorsports Raceway
Description: The longest WKA go kart track in the United States. US Air Motorsports Raceway is a go-karting facility located in Shawano, Wisconsin, just 35 miles west of Green Bay on old Highway 29. The raceway was designed by Kenny Venberg, who is vice president of the World Karting Association (WKA). The raceway is 30 feet wide and over a mile long, and the 1/5 oval has 35 foot corners and a six foot elevation change from one side of the track to the other.
Address: W5901 County Road BE Shawano, WI 54166

Name: Coulee Go Kart Raceway
Description: 1/8 mile high banked paved go kart race track located in West Salem, Wisconsin. Racing Season runs May - August. Check track website for race schedule.

Name: Wyoming Kart Racing LLC Go Kart Track
Description: Outdoor paved road course go kart race track. Winter snow karting races. Kart rentals available. Wyoming Kart Racing welcomes kids must be at least 4'6" tall to fit in the karts also Wednesdays are Ladies day. See website for details and race schedules. Wyoming Kart Racing LLC is the only official importer of Corse Karts from the Kart Company in Switzerland and offers importation of most other brands of racing parts.
